name: Nosey Roads
description:
Nosey Roads, the third installment of the Nosey Jumpers franchise, follows Nosey McNostril (and his alter ego, the race driver Snotty Runnynose) through a journey ON WHEELS! Drive through colorful levels collecting jewels and avoiding obstacles in order to conquer Noseville's Golden Crown.

Version 1.0 of this app does not support the following:
-Saving game state through game sessions, such as your game score

Only available on devices that support ARKit (iOS 11 and above).

Thanks for your support!
